channel.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
channel.description:
[Interest Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/interest-check-scp-transfer-roleplay/77844?u=james)
*To sign up, put your character sheet here. Here’s a D-Class Template.*
># Character Sheet >**Name -** **Gender -** **Appearance -** **Crime -** **Personality -** **Personal Skills -** **[color=orange]D-Class[/color]** - Designated Number
If you don’t want to be D-Class, contact me *first*. **You can’t be an SCP.**
[color=orange]**D-Class**[/color] [color=yellow]**Scientist**[/color] [color=Gray]**Security Department**[/color] [color=blue]**Nine Tailed Fox**[/color]

item.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
item.dc:creator: SogMan
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Jeremy Simmons
Gender - Male
Appearance - In his 30s, bald, brown eyes and athletic build
Personality - Friendly “no one left behind” kind of person, quick to defend his friends. Has a deep fear of crocodiles due to a boating accident. Moved up in the ranks surprisingly quickly.
Personal skills - First aid and survival
Rank - Security Department - Lieutenant with level 4 keycard.

Read full topic

item.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
(Oof idk how good this is because i haven’t done this for a while. DM me if there’s any adjustments i could/should make to improve it, thx)

Character Sheet

Name: Alecia Dunbrack
Gender: Female
Appearance: A woman with a deceptively average build that’s roughened from years of working with cars and dark wavy hair that’s habitually braided or tied back. She has a large scar on her lower right abdomen that’s carefully hidden behind various intricate tattoos that snakes up her neck and down her left arm.
Crime: Car and Aircraft hijacking
Personality: Alecia has a good grasp of her abilities and won’t back down from a good opportunity if she sees one but she’ll flee from danger the instant she believes that it becomes too much. She’s a bit materialistic and has a difficult time trusting anyone she doesn’t consider to be apart of her “crew” without some sort of collateral or proof.
Personal Skills: Mechanical skills, Ingenuity
D-Class - 447

Read full topic

item.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
item.dc:creator: Emilia
item.description:
Name - Elizabeth Miller
Gender - Female
Appearances - tall, athletic has medium black hair with blue eyes
Personality - serious, believes ends justify the means
Personal Skills - Advanced training
Security Department - Soldier
Level 3 Keycard.

Read full topic

item.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
item.dc:creator: Boss110
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Mach Riverine
Gender - Male
Appearance - A tall man with short, white hair and gray eyes. Free of tattoo. He is always seen wearing glasses due to Myopia.
Personality - He can’t seem to stay in one place for too long, always see working on a lot of SCPs whenever it’s his specialty or not, unless it’s something he’s interested in he will forget about it real quick.
Personal Skills - Expert at inanimate objects.
Level Keycard - 4
Scientist - Senior Researcher.

Read full topic

item.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
item.dc:creator: DirectorHail
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Jack Demond
Gender - Male
Appearance - 5.8 ft, Green eyes and blonde hair. Has a scar across the left eye, Always maintains a firm look.
Crime - Hacking into high security systems and selling off information, Caught when trying to hack the SCP foundation servers.
Personality - Quiet and try’s to isolate himself from others. Very defensive and prefers to do things online.
Personal Skills - Hacking(Aka very good with technology)
D-Class - 652

Read full topic

item.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Marcus Aveyerd
Gender - Male
Appearance - fairly tall with a lean build, a mop of midnight-black hair and green eyes. Free of tattoos. He generally has a nervous, yet happy/excited look in his eyes (for the time being)
Personality - Extremely fascinated by the idea of SCPs, very new to the job. He’s very happy to be here, and although he doesnt know too much about working here, he’s ready to learn!
Personal Skills - A good memory, strong logical reasoning.
Rank - Junior Researcher Aveyerd. A level 2 keycard in his current position.

Read full topic

item.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Character Sheet

Name - Leo Teolan
Gender - Male
Appearance - Brown hair covering his sea green eyes. He has a marking burned into his left arm, depicting a shield. He’s charismatic, seems trustworthy.
Crime - Armed Robbery
Personality - Seems kindly, He’s used to getting his way. He can be stubborn at times, but he’s used to looking after himself.
Personal Skills - Combat
D-Class - 148

Read full topic

item.title: [Character Sheets] SCP: Transfer {Roleplay}
item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
Example Card -

Character Sheet

Name - Thomas Rivers
Gender - Male
Appearance - A scar on the back of his hand, a snake tattoo on his neck. Hair, black as ink, covers his head. His eyes are green, shifty and untrustworthy.
Crime - Smuggling
Personality - He never turns out a customer. He’s willing to trade his services for a… favour. He seems to know everyone in the Site.
Personal Skills - Thievery, secrets.
D-Class - 705

Read full topic
